reviewText: Despite a prior review, I did not have any issues running the game.  That said, as a poker game it feels a bit simple for my tastes, and is in no way a good substitute for a live poker game (either in person, or online).\n\nIf you're just learning how to play the game, this can be good practice for you.  However, if you're looking at this game because you're already into poker, skip the purchase.  This will not scratch the poker itch effectively.
voteText: 6 of 7 people (86%) found this review helpful

reviewText: The fast gameplay is a nice change of pace from the TellTale Poker Night games. Sound effects are a bit dopey and repeditive. I play with music on in the back ground and it works out just fine.\n\nThis seems like it was geared more towards the poker crowd and less towards the PC gaming crowed. I enjoyed it and if you like poker, I think you will too. However I can see how some people would be disappointed if they were expecting a game with a ton of personality.
